title: Cosmic Sci-Fi Impacts Sound Effects Pack
description: Supercharge your games with our fully unique futuristic and neo noir sci-fi sound collection.
longDescription:
Listen to the audio preview > HERE

Check out the video preview > HERE


Cosmic Impacts: Our Futuristic and Sci-Fi Noir sound effects collection.


Enhance your games with our fully designed and ready to use out of the box Cosmic Impacts.


Our fully unique cosmic sound collection has everything you require and the flexibility you demand. From powerful spaceship pass-bys to massive hits, you are ready to infuse your next project with a distinctive noir sci-fi allure!


Multiple Variations

We made many versions of each sound to ensure versatility and variety in sound programming. The 45 Designed Impacts contains multiple variations in style or duration. With a grand total of 259 meticulously curated sound effects, satisfaction is not just guaranteed but elevated to new heights.


Drag-and-Drop Ready

All sounds are pre-mixed and mastered to industry-leading quality. Just drag and drop them into your project. No further edits are needed.


UCS Compliant and detailed Metadata embedded

Cosmic Impacts is fully universal category system (UCS) compliant. Additionally, to enhance your workflow and make it more efficient, all audio files come with detailed metadata to locate the desired sounds quickly. Audio management tools like Soundminer and BaseHead can read and process metadata.


You can view the complete asset list > HERE


Download the free version of Cosmic Impacts > HERE

technicalDetails:
Number of sound effects: 259 royalty-free sounds in total.

Audio file types: wav

Sample rate: 44.1 kHz

Bit depth: 16-bit

Loopable: No

Additional: Stereo format

Total Minutes of Audio: 23 minutes 05 seconds

Target Platform: All

Important/Additional Notes: No
